page.title: 14FRESHWATER FIRE STATION
page.content:
Freshwater Fire Station is manned by 12 part time men.These men have jobs but when there is a fire,their pagers bleep.The pagers are set off by Newport Headquarters.999 calls go first to Portsmouth then Newport, then Freshwater.The message comes on ticker tape saying where the fire is,the time,and the date.There is one water tender and one water carrier, they are white in colour.There is a station officer in charge and two leading firemen.Last year there were 140 fire calls in the West Wight.My dad used to be a fireman but he isn't any more.
Martin Roy Smith 8 years
